main.name: Saroj Dahal
main.description: I am a Python and Web developer with the expertise in Django and Machine Learning. I also have knowledge of front-end technologies like Javascript and React. I have completed my Bachelor in Electronics Engineering.
main.bio: Hi! my name is Saroj Dahal. I am a Python and Web developer (2+ year experience) with the expertise in Django (for rest api), postgresSQL (for database) and Machine Learning. I also have knowledge of front-end technologies like Javascript and React. I also have knowledge of git and docker. Regarding my education, I have completed my Bachelors degree in Electronics Engineering.
